suncertify

Class PropertiesReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.PropertiesReader

  • public class PropertiesReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class enables access to the properties file. It provides methods to get and set properties in the properties file.
    Version:
    Dec 11, 2012
    Author:
    Moses L. Jilugu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PropertiesReader sharedInstance 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDatabaseFile()
      Returns the value for database file path.
      java.lang.String getDatabaseHost()
      Returns the value of database host IP or hostname.
      int getDatabasePort()
      Returns the value of database server port number.
      static PropertiesReader getSharedInstance()
      Returns a shared instance of PropertiesReader to be used by any class that needs to use properties in the properties file.
      void setDatabaseFile(java.lang.String dbFile)
      Sets the value of path to database file.
      void setDatabaseHost(java.lang.String hostStr)
      Sets the value of database host property.
      void setDatabasePort(java.lang.String portNumber)
      Sets the value of database server port number.
      void storeProperties()
      This method persists the properties to the properties file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • sharedInstance

        public static PropertiesReader sharedInstance

    • Method Detail

      • getSharedInstance

        public static PropertiesReader getSharedInstance()
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a shared instance of PropertiesReader to be used by any class that needs to use properties in the properties file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if properties file cannot be found.
